original_text: Speak now in the ears of the people, and let every man borrow of his neighbour, and every woman of her neighbour, jewels of silver and jewels of gold.
korean_text: 백성에게 말하여 사람들에게 각기 이웃들에게 은금 패물을 구하게 하라 하시더니

sentences.original_text: Speak now in the ears of the people
and let every man borrow of his neighbour
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 남자는 그의 이웃에게서 빌리고

sentences.original_text: and every woman of her neighbour
jewels of silver and jewels of gold
